entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH THIS AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
